00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <stdlib.h>
00037 #include <sys/types.h>
00038 #include <sys/stat.h>
00039 #include <errno.h>
00040 #include <string.h>
00041 #include <fcntl.h>
00042 #include <unistd.h>
00043 #include <getopt.h>
00044 
00045 void usage(const char *prog, int status)
00046 {
00047         fprintf(status == 0 ? stdout : stderr,
00048                 "Usage: %s [OPTION]... FILE\n"
00049                 "  -d, --device=DEV  use device number DEV\n"
00050                 "  -h, --help        dispaly help\n"
00051                 "  -m, --mode=MODE   use mode MODE\n"
00052                 "  -M, --major=MAJOR use device major MAJOR\n"
00053                 "  -N, --minor=MINOR use device minor MINOR\n",
00054                 prog);
00055 
00056         exit(status);
00057 }
00058 
00059 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
00060 {
00061         struct option opts[] = {
00062                 { "device", 1, NULL, 'd' },
00063                 { "help",   0, NULL, 'h' },
00064                 { "mode",   1, NULL, 'm' },
00065                 { "major",  1, NULL, 'M' },
00066                 { "minor",  1, NULL, 'N' },
00067                 { NULL },
00068         };
00069         const char *path;
00070         mode_t mode = S_IFREG | 0644;
00071         dev_t dev = 0;
00072         int rc;
00073 
00074         int c;
00075         while ((c = getopt_long(argc, argv, "d:hm:M:N:", opts, NULL)) != -1) {
00076                 switch (c) {
00077                 case 'd':
00078                         dev = strtoul(optarg, NULL, 0);
00079                         break;
00080                 case 'h':
00081                         usage(argv[0], 0);
00082                 case 'm':
00083                         mode = strtoul(optarg, NULL, 0);
00084                         break;
00085                 case 'M':
00086                         dev = makedev(strtoul(optarg, NULL, 0), minor(dev));
00087                         break;
00088                 case 'N':
00089                         dev = makedev(major(dev), strtoul(optarg, NULL, 0));
00090                         break;
00091                 case '?':
00092                         usage(argv[0], 1);
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         if (argc - optind != 1)
00097                 usage(argv[0], 1);
00098 
00099         path = argv[optind];
00100 
00101         if ((mode & S_IFMT) == S_IFDIR)
00102                 rc = mkdir(path, mode & ~S_IFMT);
00103         else if ((mode & S_IFMT) == S_IFLNK)
00104                 rc = symlink("oldpath", path);
00105         else
00106                 rc = mknod(path, mode, dev);
00107 
00108         if (rc)
00109                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: cannot create `%s' with mode %#o: %s\n",
00110                         argv[0], path, mode, strerror(errno));
00111 
00112         return rc;
00113 }
